action.primary: Clears Heat, promotes the secretion of body fluids, moisten dryness and removes toxicity

indications: Sores and boils, cough due to Deficiency-Heat, dysphoria

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with Deficiency Cold in Spleen and Stomach.

notes: Extract the juice and take 30~90g each time.
This herb can be used to alleviate a hangover.
